CareSpecialty.name: CareSpecialty
CareSpecialty.description: Represents a listing of provider specialty codes and descriptions. For example, 02 - Physician/General Surgery.

Description.type: Create, Filter, Group, Nillable, Sort, Update

EffectiveFrom.description: The date from which this specialty is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date on which this specialty is no longer effective.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the record is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the specialty master record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

SpecialtyUsage.description: Indicates whether this specialty is related to the practitioner, the organization, or both.
